title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 21.3 - Foreign exclusion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 21.3 - Foreign exclusion

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall not apply to any deposit
account or equivalent which is payable only at an office located outside of the

United States. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
21.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
